name: ReZoop
overview:
ReZoop is a Universal mobile loyalty app for the businesses.

Any business can register with ReZoop. The company provides mobile customer loyalty management using QR codes. Businesses do not need any hardware to set up the program. Customers use their Android phones or I phones to register with the businesses

Businesses can send rewards or the “Zoops” (messages and freebies) to the customer’s phone via the ReZoop app.

The service is free for the businesses and the customers. Future monetization will be advertisement based.
